response.answer_text: Punk/emo teen speaking, this style might either make you look like an 80s kid or goth cultist. 99 times of 100 wear black. Studded wear is often common. Ripped jeans, combat boots, dark shoes in general are pretty basic. I don’t recommend (especially in large quantities) but eyeliner gets the point across. Band t-shirts are a go-to often times, along with rings, studded belts, and rubber bracelets.
